title: About
aboutText:
Talented programmer with years of commercial experience, currently working in Sydney. A good listener with excellent communication skills, want to work in a creative and collaborative team.
 A hard worker, a quick learner, a critical problem solver and a passionate programmer with solid and in depth OO programming skills.
 Familiar with various technologies, such as .NET, MVC, WPF, Web Service, HTML/CSS, JavaScript(Angular/Angular2/TypeScript/ReactJs/Redux), or relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, or SQL Server etc.).
